name: Bubble Shooter 2: Solid Space
description:
Bubble Shooter 2 : Solid Space is the second installment in my Bubble Shooter series.

It is just what you'd expect from a bubble shooter - there isn't too much to it.

It's lightweight, easy to play and a fun game when you are bored and there really isn't anything else to do. 

The game was developed in unity, everything is made from scratch. 

I'll gladly implement requests if you have any suggestions how to improve the game.
